eqRotDoc:centrifugalPumpDataSheet.obj:remark: This data set provides the as built specifications for a centrifugal pump
Other Pump Remarks: requirements or details not completely addressed elsewhere

dx:supportDocument.dx:documentDescription: Safety Injection Centrifugal Pump Instruction Manuals in PDF format
Safety Injection Centrifugal Pump General Arrangement Drawing

eq:materialUtilityServiceProvided.eq:remark: Requirements for cooling water utility service fulfilled in accordance with EPA regulations

eq:surfacePreparationPaint.eq:remark: External carbon steel surfaces shall be painted. Stainless steel and wet/moist surfaces shall not be painted unless otherwise specified.

eq:nameplate.eq:description: ASME Code Sec III - paragraph 7.6, NCA-8200

eqRot:mechanicalSeal.obj:remark: NORMAL CONDITIONS LEAK RATE<=60cc/hour, SEAL FAILURE LEAK RATE<=50gpm.

eqRot:operatingPerformance.eqRot:remark: MINI FLOW=4/year, FLOW TEST=4/year, SAFETY INJECTION=1/lifetime, SAFETY SHUTDOWN=1/lifetime
